alert.note: Alert for Johnson (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 12 at 9:58AM CDT until October 12 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Johnson County in western Arkansas... * Until 1030 AM CDT. * At 958 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wiederkehr Village, or near Ozark, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Clarksville... Lamar... Woodland... Oak Grove in Johnson County... Hunt... Harmony... Ozone... Hillcrest in Johnson County... Union City... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
